title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2656.3 - Submission requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2656.3 - Submission requirements

State Regulations

The property owner(s) shall provide the local assessing
unit with a copy of all applicable regulatory agreements and, on an annual
basis, income documentation prior to the taxable status date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2656.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
